Title: The world is yours, as well as ours, but in the last analysis, it is yours. You young people, full of vigor and vitality, are in the bloom of life, like the sun at eight or nine in the morning. Our hope is placed on you.
Designer: Beijing Film Academy Jinggangshan Commune (北京电影学院井冈山公社)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
